fr.ece.ostis

Class OstisService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • fr.ece.ostis.OstisService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DroneVideoListener, NavDataListener, SpeechRecognitionResultsListener

    public class OstisService
extends Service
implements SpeechRecognitionResultsListener, NavDataListener, DroneVideoListener
    The android service that is the heart of the project. It connects to the drone, and instantiates the various managers.
    Version:
    2014-02-07
    Author:
    Nicolas Schurando

                              throws Exception

        Throws:
        Exception - when the command failed to be pushed to the drone.
